articles.title: Manoah, Springer joining Guerrero Jr. and Kirk at MLB All-Star Game - TSN
articles.description: Toronto Blue Jays pitcher Alek Manoah and centre-fielder George Springer were added Sunday to the American League lineup for the July 19 All-Star Game.
articles.content:
Toronto Blue Jays pitcher Alek Manoah and centre-fielder George Springer were added Sunday to the American League lineup for the July 19 All-Star Game.
